casebody.data:
EZ GARD INDUSTRIES, INC., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. XO ATHLETIC CO., Defendant-Appellant. and Paul J. Andre, Defendant. No. 2008-1384. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Dec. 15, 2008. William L. Roberts, Faegre & Benson LLP, of Minneapolis, MN, argued for plaintiff-appellee. With him on the brief were Kevin P. Wagner and Timothy E. Grimsrud. Stephen M. Chin, von Simson & Chin LLP, of New York, NY, argued for defendant-appellant.

NEWMAN, LINN, and MOORE, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
